title: Despair of Athkatla
content:
ear that Lorroakan's short temper hasflowed into his staff. It flows into your brain in shades of burgundy and carmine, bright as the storm-lanterns of Lorroakan's homeland.

BG3 Despair of Athkatla Information

Arcane Enchantment: You gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC and spell attack rolls. Range: 1.5m

BG3 Despair of Athkatla Location & Where to Find

Location: Baldur's Gate Dropped by: Lorroakan in Ramazith's Tower.

Despair of Athkatla Notes & Tips for BG3

Rarity: Rare Value: 190 Gp. Weight
